sentences.sentence: He proposes to extend the interest subvention of 2 per cent for one more year for exports covering handicrafts, carpets, handlooms and small and medium enterprises.
sentences.translation: 他建议出口的2%的利息补助将超过一年，包括手工艺品，地摊，手摇织机和中小型企业。
